query: Could you help design a 5-day travel plan for 4 people? We are planning to leave from Key West and visit 2 cities in North Carolina between March 1st and March 5th, 2022. A budget for the trip has been set at $8,300. We require entire rooms for accommodations and will be bringing our pets. We're particularly fond of Italian, Indian, Mediterranean, and American cuisines, so we would love to integrate those into our trip as well.
actions: choose_city_bundle:[Asheville,Charlotte]
